latex: Suppose N is a $6$-digit number having base-$10$ representation $\underline{a}\text{ }\underline{b}\text{ }\underline{c}\text{ }\underline{d}\text{ }\underline{e}\text{ }\underline{f}$.  If $N$ is $6/7$ of the number having base-$10$ representation $\underline{d}\text{ }\underline{e}\text{ }\underline{f}\text{ }\underline{a}\text{ }\underline{b}\text{ }\underline{c}$, find $N$.
